name: Bedlamball
description: Bedlamball is a goal scoring game where you change the rules as you play!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Pretty much anything should work DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 120 MB available space Additional Notes: Controllers strongly recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2GHz+ Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 120 MB available space
